message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a highly valuable product. I believe it's worth considering a price of $1500000 for this exceptional item.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm definitely interested, but I'm not sure I can justify that price right now.  Would you be willing to consider a price of $1250000? I believe this is a fair price given the value I see in this product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $1375000. This is a fair compromise that I believe reflects the value of the product, while also taking into account your concerns about the initial price.
